text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

translation.en: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an
translation.id: Dan sungguh, Kami telah memberikan kepadamu tujuh (ayat) yang (dibaca) berulang-ulang445) dan Alquran yang agung
